description: Test suite for the Agent's tool usage, including synchronous and asynchronous tests, stream handling, multiple tool calls, and custom tool functions within the 'agno' project.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with YFinanceTools to fetch stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response with tool calls and content verification.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage with YFinanceTools.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test with tool calls and content verification.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Test with multiple tools (YFinanceTools and DuckDuckGoTools) and instructions for combined queries.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Test with a custom tool function that requires no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Test with a custom tool function that has optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Test with a tool that handles list parameters, verifying multiple URLs.
